Uses of Interface
javax.validation.spi.ValidationProvider

  • Packages that use ValidationProvider 
    Package Description
    javax.validation
    Top level package of the Jakarta Bean Validation API.

    • Uses of ValidationProvider in javax.validation

      Builds a Configuration for a particular provider implementation.
      Methods in javax.validation that return types with arguments of type ValidationProvider
